name: Milad
description: I am Milad as an experienced Software Engineer with over 9 years in web services, I've been working on countless projects, each presenting its unique potentials and challenges. Every challenge overcome has enriched my knowledge base and fine-tuned my expertise. My journey thus far has fueled my desire to share my accumulated wealth of knowledge, and that's why this Sign Language Tech was born into here.

name: Andrés
description: I'm Andrés García, a Software Engineer from Colombia with over 7 years of experience. My journey in tech has been driven by a passion for building useful products and a deep curiosity for how things work, from mobile apps to AI. My main focus is Flutter, but I also have a strong background in full-stack development. As a Deaf professional, I'm also dedicated to making technology more accessible for everyone. This led me to contribute to the tech community as an open-source maintainer, a speaker at events like Google I/O Extended, and the Tech Lead for the 'Sign Language Tech' initiative.
